summary: I upload here one of my character which have Master difficulty.
descriptionHtml:
Hi, I'm NickKage. It's a terrible name but that was free...
It's a savegame on Master difficulty and it's on level 10. Little low but the skills are more balanced of hard difficulty.

[size=4]Story of the Character:
[/size]He is called Agronak and it's an Imperial, he used to be an Mercenary until a Job didn't go as planned.
The story is written with Take Notes mod by Lord Conti. If you don't have the mod but want to know about the character i put a text file
where the story is written like Agronak did.

[size=4]


Requirements:
[/size]Well, the savegame use many mods but i will write the useful ones.
Racemenu by Expired is required only for the tattoos.
DreamBurrows Regal Huntsman Amor is the amor of the character.
I use the SPERG sistem, maybe will work without but the character will have low skills.
Skyrim is required for playing.
I have all DLC'S but i don't know if work without.

[size=4]My Notes:
[/size]It's a save game but i give free permission for editing it or share it, just credit me.
When i have some experience about the Creation Kit maybe can be a follower.
English isn't my native language and i will ask to forget the grammar errors if present.
The Screen are in the download file. I don't know but the Nexus can't upload it.
author: NickKage
